example_en: Love is the most powerful emotion.
He gave her a kiss on the cheek.
She gave him a warm hug.
They went on a date last night.
She introduced her boyfriend to her parents.
He bought flowers for his girlfriend.
They decided to get a divorce.
The breakup was difficult for both.
She has a crush on her classmate.
He was flirting with her all night.
Trust is the foundation of any relationship.
Their relationship was full of passion.
Commitment is key in a relationship.
He gave her a nice compliment.
They have been married for ten years.
They went to Paris for their honeymoon.
She is very supportive of his dreams.
example_ka: ის მის ოცნებებს ძალიან უჭერს მხარს.

example_en: There was instant chemistry between them.
They held each other in a tight embrace.
His devotion to her was clear.
He is very loyal to his girlfriend.
What gift should I buy for her?
I hope we can be together.
You are my dream come true.
I promise I'll never hurt you.
I'm so lucky to have you.
example_ka: ძალიან იღბლიანი ვარ, რომ შენ მყავხარ.

example_en: I want to be with you forever.
That's my favorite memory with you.
I love the sound of your voice.
You bring joy to my life.
Being with you gives me peace.
You are so generous with your love.
I love how confident you are.
That was so sweet of you.
Hey babe, how was your day?
I desire to be with you.
I feel a deep longing for you.
My heart is yearning for you.
My adoration for you grows daily.
I feel your warmth when you're near.
example_ka: შენი სითბო ვგრძნობ, როცა ახლოს ხარ.

example_en: Being with you is pure bliss.
Your kiss fills me with euphoria.
I am completely captivated by you.
I am mesmerized by your beauty.
I am completely smitten with you.
I am dedicated to our relationship.
My feelings for you are genuine.
I am sincere about my love.
I want to be open with you.
You make me feel safe to be vulnerable.
example_ka: შენ უსაფრთხოს მაგრძნობინებ, რომ დაუცველი ვიყო.

example_en: I feel secure in your love.
I feel protected when I'm with you.
I feel encouraged by your support.
I always feel supported by you.
I feel completely accepted by you.
I feel so loved by you.
I feel blessed to have you.
example_ka: კურთხეული ვგრძნობ თავს, რომ შენ მყავხარ.

example_en: I am so grateful for you.
I am thankful for your love.
I am fortunate to love you.
I am content when I'm with you.
I am satisfied with our love.
I feel peaceful in your arms.
Our love is steady and strong.
You are the most trustworthy person I know.
example_ka: შენ ყველაზე სანდო ადამიანი ხარ, ვინც ვიცნობ.

example_en: You have such an innocent smile.
You have such a joyful spirit.
I am hopeful about our future.
I see a bright future with you.
We have similar goals in life.
I love making plans with you.
